DOC.brief_summary: A single center , non-randomized clinical trial two-dose prim healthy adult evaluate safety immunogenicity booster dose inactivate pandemic influenza ( H5N1 ) vaccine ( whole-virion , aluminium-adjuvanted ) .
DOC.brief_title: Safety Immunogenicity Booster Dose An Inactivated , Adjuvanted Whole-Virion Pandemic Influenza ( H5N1 ) Vaccine
